column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
EC2- increased number of instances from total 6 to 8 for the Web Servers
RDS service increased to db.m5.8xlarge vCPU: 32 Memory: 128 GiB. Increased backup storage amount to 10 TB. It provides increased resilience and redundancy with its multi-region deployment.
Added Amazon CloudWatch, to collect various logs and notify me during any alarms.
VPC - increased number of NAT Gateways from 1 to 2
